General.Name: S-Fuelcell co. Ltd
General.Description: S-Fuelcell Co., Ltd. provides fuel cell systems, hydrogen generation systems, and fuel conversion devices. It also offers operation and maintenance, and after-sales services fuel cell systems. In addition, the company operates free energy planet and by-product hydrogen application solutions. Further, its products are used in buildings, transport, and power generation businesses. S-Fuelcell co., Ltd. was founded in 2014 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: U2O Korea Building, 546, Seongnam, South Korea, 13230
